WizardTD

类 Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Tower

  • public class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
    Tower has the ability to attack monster using its bullet.

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(float xPos,
                        float yPos)
        Set the position of the tower based on the mouse position.
        参数:
        xPos - the pixel coordinate for x
        yPos - the pixel coordinate for y

      • getImage

        public processing.core.PImage getImage()
        Get the image of the tower.
        返回:
        tower image

      • updateImage

        public void updateImage()
        Update the image of the tower based on the upgrade level.

      • getPosition

        public float[] getPosition()
        Get the position of the tower.
        返回:
        tower position in {x,y}

      • isOver

        public boolean isOver(float xPos,
                      float yPos)
        Check whether the given position is the same as this tower.
        参数:
        xPos - the pixel coordinate for x
        yPos - the pixel coordinate for y
        返回:
        whether the given position is the same as this tower

      • getRange

        public int getRange()
        Get the range of the tower.
        返回:
        tower range

      • getUpgradeCost

        public int getUpgradeCost(char toUpgrade)
        Get the upgrade cost of a specific level of the tower.
        参数:
        toUpgrade - the specific upgrade part (range, speed, damage)
        返回:
        upgrade cost

      • upgradeTower

        public void upgradeTower(char toUpgrade)
        Upgrade the tower (range, speed, damage)
        参数:
        toUpgrade - the specific upgrade part (range, speed, damage)

      • getUpgradeLevel

        public int getUpgradeLevel(char toCheck)
        Get the tower upgrade level (range, speed, damage)
        参数:
        toCheck - the specific upgrade part (range, speed, damage)
        返回:
        the corresponding level

      • fire

        public void fire(Monster target)
        The tower will fire a bullet to the given target. A bullet object will be instantiated here.
        参数:
        target - monster to attack

      • updateFireCoolDown

        public void updateFireCoolDown(double time)
        Reduce the fire cooldown by a given time.
        参数:
        time - time to reduce the fire cooldown

      • isReadyToFire

        public boolean isReadyToFire()
        Check whether the fire cooldown is 0.
        返回:
        whether the tower is ready to fire

      • getBulletList

        public java.util.List<Bullet> getBulletList()
        Get the current bullet list of the tower for the game to draw.
        返回:
        bullet list
